name: Project Skyfall
description:
We are two students and this is our first game. we would very much like to know about our opinion! (all the art, music, and code was made by us)

You will be playing as Bobo, who is falling through the skies! The  objective of the game is to last as long as possible. 

There are two ways of dying:

-by getting hit by certain obstacles 3 times (Bombs, Nukes, Airplanes)

-by going too high!!!

(In mobile it might be laggy..... we are trying to fix that :) )

Bobo says Hi! :)
